content.description: fire past 2 bolts then power past the crux to easier ground at the top
content.location: Far left route on the back wall

content.description: Follow along the face of a rightward slanting ledge, then pull past a bulge to a rest stance. Clip the last bolt then finish with an awesome sequence of ledges to the chains.
content.protection: 4 bolts to chains (shared anchor with route to the right)
content.location: 2nd route from the right on the "back wall".

content.description: Carefuly move up a technical face to the first bolt then up to a low angled ledge. Follow easy holds to another ledge. Clip a final bolt then traverse left along jugs to the shared anchor.
content.protection: 4 bolts to chains (shared anchor with route to the left)
content.location: Right most route on the wall.

content.description: As of 4-15-21 this route has been re-engineered. Start by stemming  a corner, pull a high step right, and then join the original pumpy finish
content.protection: 4 bolts to chains (shard anchor with route on the right)
content.location: Middle of the 5 routes on the "back wall".

content.description: Start up an arete to a low angle section. Clip a bolt on the headwall then head to the anchors (can chimney on the left or follow jugs on the face to the right).
content.location: Middle of the 3 routes in the "front chunk" of rock.

content.description: follow easy ground past a bush to a high first bolt then continue trending up and right. Shares anchors with the 10c to its right
content.protection: 4 bolts to chains (shared anchor with route to the right)
content.location: 2nd from the left on the "back wall"

climbs.name: Dendrite Twins
climbs.fa: (TR) Dwain Warren and Locker, First Lead: Dave Evans

content.description: Climb a juggy arete to an even juggier headwall.
content.location: The rightmost route on the warmup "front chunk" area.

climbs.name: Cosmic Locker
climbs.fa: (TR) Dwain Warren and Locker, First Lead: Jcrew, Dave Evans

content.description: Starts in the dihedral (optional crack), move left past a mini roof then head up a short headwall.
content.protection: 4 bolts, long slings recommend  for the anchor
content.location: The far left route of the "front chunk" of rock.
